generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, curbs, and vegetation alongside it, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian walkway is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by trees and curbs, which is a sidewalk.
- building: A multi-story building with windows and commercial storefronts is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green and yellow leaves are present along the road and sidewalks.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible along the curbs and between the road and sidewalks.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a black car and a white car in the foreground.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the right side of the image, near the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, hanging above the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- rider: A person is riding a motorcycle on the right side of the image.
